latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: Potentially hazardous food whether catered or brought from home not provided with facilities to maintain temperatures required by Health Code 8109
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: No Trip leader in caharge of campers during off camp tripsTrip leader does not have adequate experience and competency Trip leader not of required age Trip Leader not certified in responding to emergencies first aid or accompanied by certified individual
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Aquatics Director is not certified in CPR for the Professional rescuer Certification is not current Cerification is not limited to one year validation period
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Camp fails to provides one Lifeguard for 25 campers when using off site facility lifeguard observed supervising more than 3400 ft of pool surface 50 yards of shoreline
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers not provided have not been inspected and tagged prior to camp season
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Health Director not qualified MD Nurse EMT Health Director not on site at overnight camp not available to summer day and traveling camps Assistant was not designated where required
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Aquatics Director is not 21 years of age does not have 3 seasons of relative experience
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Food supervisors do not have a Food Protection Certificate in accordance with HC 8115
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Camp health program not maintained and/or supervised by physician Health records of campers and staff are not kept and maintained plan is not comprehensive and complete nutrition emergency and first aid plan accident reporting disaster search and rescue child observation food and facility maintenance not included
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
